about_the_game:
Liu Yi's theme song of different world adventure games - light [/] [/]



The main production concept is the heroine in my eyes

A warm, sunny girl's adventure in muenquis continent

I feel this unprecedented warmth through your light

Also by liking you, let yourself become a better self
